{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "970ad54f-5c94-4032-aab3-14909923f016",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "![title](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/messari/messari-python-api-private/main/examples/notebooks/images/deepdao_messari_python.PNG?token=ADKDZDHLWXHNU3P5FHWDBMDBXJJSA)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "likely-radio",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# DeepDAO Python API Tutorial "
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "d22e8023",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "This tutorial aims to be a quick guide to get you started using the DeepDAO API integrated into messari's python library."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "id": "593e4795",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "from messari.deepdao import DeepDAO\n",
    "dd = DeepDAO()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "813f1412",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## API Structure\n",
    "The Deep DAO Python client contains a number of functions that wrap some of Deep DAO's API endpoints. These include:\n",
    "\n",
    "Helpers\n",
    "* get_dao_list\n",
    "\n",
    "* get_member_list\n",
    "\n",
    "Overview\n",
    "* get_organizations\n",
    "\n",
    "* get_summary\n",
    "\n",
    "* get_rankings\n",
    "\n",
    "* get_tokens\n",
    "\n",
    "DAOs\n",
    "* get_dao_info\n",
    "\n",
    "* get_dao_activity\n",
    "\n",
    "* get_dao_members\n",
    "\n",
    "* get_dao_financials\n",
    "\n",
    "Members\n",
    "* get_top_members\n",
    "\n",
    "* get_member_info\n",
    "\n",
    "* get_member_proposals\n",
    "\n",
    "* get_member_votes\n",
    "\n",
    "Below are a few examples to showcase the functionality and types of data each function generates."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "ecd6b9b7",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Helpers"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "bac27ec5",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "These set functions return lists which can be used to find Deep DAO supported DAOs as well as DAO Members"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "a40e89fa",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Get dao list"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "3b1e3b3d",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "The function returns a list of all the DAOs tracked by DeepDAO"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "id": "de221c03",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "['Compound', 'Idle Finance', 'Fei', 'BProtocol', 'Gitcoin']"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 3,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "dao_list = dd.get_dao_list()\n",
    "dao_list[:5]"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "54811e08",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Get member list"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "fd78d2e9",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "The function returns a list of all the DAO Members tracked by DeepDAO"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "id": "605e8a12",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "['Cr1pto', 'lordgiv.eth', 'OOXili', 'keysplatz.eth', 'tlmlit.eth']"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 2,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "member_list = dd.get_member_list()\n",
    "member_list[:5]"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "72a92090",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Overview Functions"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "e27c4557",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "These functions return overviews of different data collected and shared by DeepDAO"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "781aabfa",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Get organizations"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "16127a62",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Returns basic information for all DeepDAO tracked organizations"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "id": "232408ba",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>id</th>\n",
       "      <th>title</th>\n",
       "      <th>description</th>\n",
       "      <th>active</th>\n",
       "      <th>logo</th>\n",
       "      <th>createdAt</th>\n",
       "      <th>items</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>0</th>\n",
       "      <td>59b3cb22-a5a2-4aaa-b7fb-360baa910666</td>\n",
       "      <td>SuperRare</td>\n",
       "      <td>&lt;p&gt;SuperRare is a leading NFT art platform and...</td>\n",
       "      <td>1</td>\n",
       "      <td>https://deepdao-uploads.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws...</td>\n",

       "</div>"

   "cell_type": "markdown",

   "source": [
    "### Get summary"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "208c36fe",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Returns basic summaries of information for all DeepDAO tracked organizations"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "id": "798b53bc",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>daoName</th>\n",
       "      <th>organizationId</th>\n",
       "      <th>logo</th>\n",
       "      <th>totalNumMembers</th>\n",
       "      <th>totalNumProposals</th>\n",
       "      <th>totalValueUSD</th>\n",
       "      <th>totalNumVotes</th>\n",
       "      <th>activeMembers</th>\n",

     "execution_count": 5,
     "metadata": {},

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "8c82207f",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Get overview"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "f05869df",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Returns an overview of the DAO ecosystem aggreated by DeepDAO"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "id": "b212542b",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>aum</th>\n",
       "      <th>members</th>\n",
       "      <th>over1M</th>\n",
       "      <th>over50k</th>\n",
       "      <th>over10Members</th>\n",
       "      <th>over100Members</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>2022-03-18</th>\n",
       "      <td>9378061071.794371</td>\n",
       "      <td>2200324.0</td>\n",
       "      <td>86</td>\n",
       "      <td>8</td>\n",
       "      <td>52</td>\n",
       "      <td>119</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>2022-03-19</th>\n",
       "      <td>9403315115.714058</td>\n",
       "      <td>2202332.0</td>\n",
       "      <td>86</td>\n",
       "      <td>8</td>\n",
       "      <td>52</td>\n",
       "      <td>119</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>2022-03-20</th>\n",
       "      <td>9433551835.536861</td>\n",
       "      <td>2206029.0</td>\n",
       "      <td>86</td>\n",
       "      <td>8</td>\n",
       "      <td>52</td>\n",
       "      <td>119</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>2022-03-21</th>\n",
       "      <td>9392102887.280945</td>\n",
       "      <td>2208583.0</td>\n",
       "      <td>86</td>\n",
       "      <td>8</td>\n",
       "      <td>52</td>\n",
       "      <td>119</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>2022-03-22</th>\n",
       "      <td>9998339056.559202</td>\n",
       "      <td>2210743.0</td>\n",
       "      <td>87</td>\n",
       "      <td>7</td>\n",
       "      <td>52</td>\n",
       "      <td>119</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "                          aum    members  over1M  over50k  over10Members  \\\n",
       "2022-03-18  9378061071.794371  2200324.0      86        8             52   \n",
       "2022-03-19  9403315115.714058  2202332.0      86        8             52   \n",
       "2022-03-20  9433551835.536861  2206029.0      86        8             52   \n",
       "2022-03-21  9392102887.280945  2208583.0      86        8             52   \n",
       "2022-03-22  9998339056.559202  2210743.0      87        7             52   \n",
       "\n",
       "            over100Members  \n",
       "2022-03-18             119  \n",
       "2022-03-19             119  \n",
       "2022-03-20             119  \n",
       "2022-03-21             119  \n",
       "2022-03-22             119  "
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 6,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "overview = dd.get_overview()\n",
    "overview.tail()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "2842c9eb",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Get rankings"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "85f53a7f",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "The function returns a pandas DataFrame of DAO ranked by different organization metrics"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "c011b08a",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## DAO Specific Functions"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "1b8a4713",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "These functions return different information for a given DAO or list of DAOs"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "id": "1139ccc1",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# DAOs tracked by Deep DAO\n",
    "daos = [\"Uniswap\", \"Compound\"]"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "e3c81c00",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Get dao info"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "a1ac51fd",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Returns basic information for a given DAO or list of DAOs"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "id": "80c07b01",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",

       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",

       "        vertical-align: top;\n",

       "\n",

       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "                                                              Uniswap  \\\n",
       "id                               fe6aa70f-4877-4f6d-9c18-9a8cafc1fe28   \n",

      ]

     "execution_count": 3,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"

   "source": [

   ]

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "3444e4e2",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Get dao activity"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "c7ab0981",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Returns activity for a given DAO or list of DAOs"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "id": "cf65ea83",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead tr th {\n",
       "        text-align: left;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead tr:last-of-type th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th colspan=\"3\" halign=\"left\">Uniswap</th>\n",
       "      <th colspan=\"3\" halign=\"left\">Compound</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>month</th>\n",
       "      <th>proposals</th>\n",
       "      <th>votes</th>\n",
       "      <th>month</th>\n",
       "      <th>proposals</th>\n",
       "      <th>votes</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>createdAt</th>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>2021-04-01</th>\n",
       "      <td>04</td>\n",
       "      <td>0</td>\n",
       "      <td>66</td>\n",

    "### Get dao financials"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "f4cebd22",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Returns information about the treasury composition of given DAO(s)"
   ]
  },

   "execution_count": 3,

     "data": {

       "\n",

       "                                 tokenAddress  tokenBalance      usdValue   \n",

       "2  0x537edd52ebcb9f48ff2f8a28c51fcdb9d6a6e0d4  7.350000e+02  1.321184e-04   \n",
       "3  0x64fb96d0395f6bf105f35233911e3df2c5bf4ce8  1.200000e+01  3.136542e-01   \n",
       "4  0x7c5d5100b339fe7d995a893af6cb496b9474373c  4.000000e+00  2.039165e-02   \n",
       "\n",
       "                      Compound              \\\n",
       "  currencyPercentage tokenName tokenSymbol   \n",
       "0       9.986133e+01       PKG         PKG   \n",
       "1       1.386704e-01       BAT         BAT   \n",
       "2       5.947710e-12       UNI         UNI   \n",
       "3       1.412009e-08      WBTC        WBTC   \n",
       "4       9.179916e-10       DAI         DAI   \n",
       "\n",
       "                                                      \\\n",
       "                                           tokenIcon   \n",
       "0                                               None   \n",
       "1  https://s3.amazonaws.com/token-icons/0x0d8775f...   \n",
       "2  https://token-icons.s3.amazonaws.com/0x1f9840a...   \n",
       "3  https://token-icons.s3.amazonaws.com/0x2260fac...   \n",
       "4  https://s3.amazonaws.com/token-icons/0x6b17547...   \n",
       "\n",
       "                                                                          \\\n",
       "                                 tokenAddress tokenBalance      usdValue   \n",
       "0  0x02f2d4a04e6e01ace88bd2cd632875543b2ef577   225.000000      0.002918   \n",
       "1  0x0d8775f648430679a709e98d2b0cb6250d2887ef  3505.146444   2845.497748   \n",
       "2  0x1f9840a85d5af5bf1d1762f925bdaddc4201f984   400.000000   3899.348616   \n",
       "3  0x2260fac5e5542a773aa44fbcfedf7c193bc2c599     0.334977  14072.583366   \n",
       "4  0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f   256.445835    255.987595   \n",
       "\n",
       "                      \n",
       "  currencyPercentage  \n",
       "0       9.383392e-10  \n",
       "1       9.150355e-04  \n",
       "2       1.253926e-03  \n",
       "3       4.525364e-03  \n",
       "4       8.231873e-05  "
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 3,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "financials = dd.get_dao_financials(dao_slugs=daos)\n",
    "financials.head()"
   ]
  },

    "### Get top members"

   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Returns a dataframe of basic information for the the top 'count' Members tracked by DeepDAO amount of DAO's particpating in. count default is 10"
   ]
  },

   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,

     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>address</th>\n",

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "5eabb009",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Get member votes"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "602652c8",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Returns voting history for given member(s)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 9,
   "id": "8fe30c36",
   "metadata": {
    "scrolled": true
   },
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "https://golden-gate-server.deepdao.io/user/2/0xb9b93bf2db3678b010e71ef701d763aee144e93e/votes\n",
      "https://golden-gate-server.deepdao.io/user/2/0x83c9440dc34da00c47a0d4dc2b598d7bdb1b53f7/votes\n"
     ]
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead tr th {\n",
       "        text-align: left;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th colspan=\"10\" halign=\"left\">Cr1pto</th>\n",
       "      <th>...</th>\n",
       "      <th colspan=\"10\" halign=\"left\">OOXili</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>voter</th>\n",
       "      <th>organizationId</th>\n",
       "      <th>daoName</th>\n",
       "      <th>daoLogo</th>\n",
       "      <th>voteNativeId</th>\n",
       "      <th>proposalId</th>\n",
       "      <th>voteChoice</th>\n",
       "      <th>createdAt</th>\n",
       "      <th>daoId</th>\n",
       "      <th>successful</th>\n",
       "      <th>...</th>\n",
       "      <th>createdAt</th>\n",
       "      <th>daoId</th>\n",
       "      <th>successful</th>\n",
       "      <th>platform</th>\n",
       "      <th>proposerId</th>\n",
       "      <th>description</th>\n",
       "      <th>snapshotProposalChoicesMappedToScores</th>\n",
       "      <th>title</th>\n",
       "      <th>status</th>\n",
       "      <th>choices</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>0</th>\n",
       "      <td>0xb9b93bf2db3678b010e71ef701d763aee144e93e</td>\n",
       "      <td>aca77a4e-ecb1-4eb3-a722-979977a52eb4</td>\n",
       "      <td>Gitcoin</td>\n",
       "      <td>gitcoin.png</td>\n",
       "      <td>0x06eed0e8d7df6d0bc8acf9f14a245dba9fd45075b118...</td>\n",
       "      <td>0xd7e430bdbff261f3b32738e44f91efe85512f9a3359e...</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.0</td>\n",
       "      <td>2022-03-18T21:00:51.000Z</td>\n",
       "      <td>7dc34a38-66bd-48bc-b40e-16c04da71a75</td>\n",
